extendedInfo.description: Evolution of Tower Defense is an ultimate game targeted on survival game type. You will playing on a large map, so you can to develop hard labyrinths for your enemies.First 10,000 downloads will receive 10,000,000 Reward Points.You can pass through evolution of defense towers via upgrade from primitive towers to unbelievably powerful towers.To increase your defense qualities, you can buy different upgrades in the game shop for game currency. You can earn money by killing monsters. Strengthen your towers to survive.-Campaign with 16 unique missions-3 Races-Protect the 'Artifact' NEW game type-73 Towers-31 Different strong monsters-4 Maps-Large-scale battles-Unlimited Waves-A lot of upgrades-Battle all the time-No any advertisements-No inner game payments-No any blockersYou are a great defender who protects humanity for ages.And you are the one, who knows the peace will not come.Do what you can do the best - protect humans from monsters.

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Met many of my expectations but i couldn\'t figure out how to change between the towers and how to upgrade the towers.pls fix so all options fit the galaxy fit screen .Then i will rate it five stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Definitely not ready for release
reviews.comment: No in game menus, first level doesn\'t really explain how to play, not sure where the enemies would be coming from. Also, the fact that the \'\'base\'\' area is two units wide, but enemies can only fit through the bottom area is confusing as well. Graphically it just looks like low Res Google map pictures
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crash all the time
reviews.comment: Everytime i do a campaing al it do is crash. Send the report but of course we all know nothing will happen. 1 star
reviews.author: Michel Perron

reviews.title: No development
reviews.comment: Map doesn\'t fit the window. Some of the animations are broken (displaying all four images stacked).  Very little info about the mission, towers, before or during game play.  No development in over a year.
reviews.author: mike burns

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Good start but needs work to feel like a real game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Several campaign objectives do not trigger. Such as my current game. \"Solve 200 waves.\" I am currently on wave 375. Force closes once every time you try to start it up after closing it mid game. With some work can be a great game imo
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: =D
reviews.comment: Fantastic game.  There is an immense number of towers, with upgrades to accompany them.  I give it ten stars.
reviews.author: Kevin Clark

reviews.title: Not polished but fun
reviews.comment: This is a typical TD game. It crashes often, and info on towers is not clearly printed, it is only found on the faq page. It does not scale well for a tablet
reviews.author: Jeffery Green

reviews.title: good but....
reviews.comment: great game with loads of up grades but stops working on high levels
reviews.author: Malcolm Clark

reviews.title: Meh ...
reviews.comment: Over 10 updates later, and it still doesn\'t work on the Samsung Note! Useless! Fix it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not ready for release
reviews.comment: Felt like an in-dev game.  No sound, sketchy menus, screen was chopped off at bottom (this tablet has onscreen keys), basically felt unfinished,/polished
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not well put together
reviews.comment: And it is a knock off.  But main problem I\'ve run into is one lvl in particular never ends....

reviews.title: Best TD I\'ve ever played
reviews.comment: #Hoping 4 EOTD2

reviews.title: Love it works very well
reviews.comment: The main problem is I\'m stuck on one level supposed to end at 150 finally gave up at level 1500 grrrrrr!!

reviews.title: Bugs and crashes
reviews.comment: Need to fix this game it bugged and it crashes way too much
